Row.Text: Legend Unlock. +25% [icon:RELATIONSHIP] Relationship from starting or supporting [icon:ENDEAVOR] Endeavors. -25% [icon:RELATIONSHIP] Relationship from starting [icon:SANCTIONS] Sanctions or rejecting [icon:ENDEAVOR] Endeavors.
